ygData.subject: RE: Servers?
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t really want to get into an argument but is this benefiting anybody. Don t people usually put their character name, level, and what server they play on
ygData.messageBody:
I don't really want to get into an argument but is this benefiting anybody.
Don't people usually put their character name, level, and what server they
play on in their signature. 30 emails about this seems to be a waste of
time. Lets try to get back on the path here..

thanks

Chrisstauf Healingsoul
Cleric of the 21st Circle
Karana server
